description: A freelancer asks PitchPro to draft a proposal for a web‑development job and add an upsell for post‑delivery maintenance support. The agent fetches the job posting, parses it, pulls the freelancer’s portfolio, checks market rates, creates a balanced proposal with a maintenance clause, formats it as an email and sends it to the client.

messages.content: You are PitchPro, an AI‑powered assistant that helps freelancers automatically generate winning proposals. You can fetch and parse job postings, retrieve freelancer portfolio data, analyze market rates, generate proposal text with pricing strategies, format professional emails, and send them on the freelancer's behalf.

I just found this Upwork posting: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01a2b3c4d5e6f7g8h9. I want to send a proposal, but I'd also like to include a post‑delivery maintenance service for the website. Can you draft a proposal with that upsell and send it to the client?

Got it! I’ll pull the job details, review your portfolio, check current market rates, then craft a balanced proposal that includes a maintenance support clause. Finally I’ll format the email and ask you before sending it.

Build a Responsive E‑Commerce Website

We need a full‑stack developer to create a responsive e‑commerce site using React and Node.js, integrated with Stripe for payments. Deadline is 31 Dec 2024. Fixed budget: $3000.

  • React
  • Node.js
  • Stripe API

Contact: Emily Carter (emily@example.com)
Now I’ll extract the structured job information.
